attributes.action: Make One Direction's 'Best Song Ever' the new National Anthem
attributes.additional_details:
I'll keep it simple: we need a new National Anthem. The current incumbent is not representative of the diverse nature of our Royal Family. There's even a baby now - it's like a posh version of Family Guy, but with less farts.

Who better to represent the rich, diverse culture and heritage of our great nation than UK Pop's very own Royal Family?

Best Song Ever is a reminder that this nation is moving in just One Direction - towards greatness.
